message: Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it holds immense value, and I'm confident it will be transformative for you. I'm asking for $1,500,000.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1,500,000 is far beyond what I'm willing to pay. Given the product's value to me, I'm prepared to offer $800,000. I believe this is a fair price that allows both of us to benefit from the transaction.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe my initial offer reflects the true value of this product. Let's meet in the middle â€“ I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,300,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm sticking to my previous offer of $800,000.  I'm confident this is a fair price that will benefit both of us. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to explore other options.
